title: Automation.com - All Industrial Automation News and Products

items.title: 61% of Cybersecurity Professionals Plan AI Adoption as Manufacturing Faces Growing Cyber Risks
items.summary:
- **61% of cybersecurity and IT professionals plan to adopt AI and machine learning** within the next year to combat rising cyber threats in manufacturing.
- Cyber risks are increasingly significant, ranked second after inflation, prompting manufacturers to prioritize **AI-driven security solutions**.
- Workforce development remains a challenge, with a focus on developing **cybersecurity and analytical skills** to enhance **security readiness** and support digital transformation.

"Cyber risk is now a top threat to manufacturing growth," emphasizing the need for **advanced AI tools** to protect and enable industry evolution.

items.title: Intelliconnect Receives AS9100 Certification
items.summary:
*Intelliconnect* (Europe), a UK-based RF connector manufacturer, earned the **AS9100 certification**, confirming their quality system meets aerospace standards.
- This certification covers *safety, reliability*, and *regulatory compliance*, applicable across the entire *aerospace supply chain*.
- Achieving and maintaining this certification involves rigorous audits, showcasing Intelliconnect's commitment to *high-quality, risk-managed production* suitable for defense and aeronautics industries.

items.title: TASI Measurement Acquires DCiii, LLC, Expanding Leadership in Chemical Injection Automation Solutions
items.summary:
*TASI Measurement* acquires *DCiii, LLC*, a leader in *chemical injection automation solutions*, strengthening its position in industrial monitoring. 
- DCiii is known for innovative products like *Mirador Chemical Injection Controller* and *cloud-based services*, ensuring *precision* and *reliability*. 
- The acquisition allows DCiii to operate independently within TASI’s division, with leadership team remaining, fostering *innovation* and *growth* in automation technology.

items.title: New A3 Report Signals Steady Automation Investment in 2025
items.summary:
*North American robotics industry showed continued momentum in the first half of 2025, with ordersup 4.3% and revenue up 7.5% compared to 2024.*
- *Automotive, life sciences, and plastics sectors led growth, driven by reshoring, labor shortages, and efficiency focus.*
- *Collaborative robots (cobots) gained market share, representing 23.7% of units in Q2, illustrating their growing role in automation.*

items.title: Mouser Electronics Offers Wide Infineon Product Portfolio
items.summary:
* Mouser Electronics is an authorized global distributor of Infineon Technologies' solutions, offering nearly 20,000 parts, with over 10,000 in stock.
* New products like the *XENSIV PAS CO2 sensor*, *PSOC 4100T Plus microcontroller*, and *CoolSiC G2 MOSFETs* highlight innovative features for IoT, power efficiency, and system design.
* Infineon focuses on *power systems* and *IoT*, supporting decarbonization and digitalization efforts worldwide.

items.title: FORT Robotics secures $18.9M funding boost
items.summary:
*F**ORT Robotics* raised an additional **$18.9 million** in Series B funding, bringing total funding to **$60.5 million**.
- The investment, led by *Tiger Global*, supports *growth* in the rapidly expanding *robotics* and *physical AI* sectors.
- Funds will enhance products, develop *next-gen safety solutions*, and accelerate *market expansion* amid increasing autonomous system deployments worldwide.

items.title: Digital Twin or Digital Flop? Why Companies Need Document Control Before 3D Models
items.summary:
- *Effective data management* is crucial; organizations must digitize and centralize asset information before implementing digital twins.
- *Poor data organization and governance* can hinder collaboration, reducing the potential benefits of digital twins.
- Establishing clear *strategic goals* ensures digital twin initiatives deliver tangible operational improvements and long-term value.

items.title: Modernizing Controls: 'Modernization' or 'Migration'–Which One Is Right for You?
SEMI Foundation Launches STEM Experience in Arizona
items.summary: *SEMI Foundation introduces SEMIquest*, an immersive STEM experience aimed at inspiring Arizona students to pursue careers in the semiconductor industry. *Part of a broader workforce development effort*, it features hands-on activities, industry showcases, and tours to connect students with real-world applications. The event highlights Arizona’s growing role in tech innovation and aims to spark early interest in STEM careers across the state.

items.title: Trelleborg invests in Delano expansion
items.summary:
*Trelleborg Sealing Solutions plans a major expansion of its Innovation Center in Delano, Minnesota.*
- The project includes a remodel of 6,000 sq ft and 40,000 sq ft of new construction for high-tech facilities, including a visitor center and automation labs.
- The upgrade aims to enhance capabilities, speed to market, and customer collaboration through advanced equipment and expert teams, with completion expected early 2027.

items.title: Increased Adoption of Robotics Driven by Cost and Safety
items.summary:
- *Robotics adoption in North America is accelerating*, driven by labor shortages and demand for efficiency.
- *Key factors include* technological advances, cost reduction, safety improvements, and meeting customer expectations.
- *Trust in robotics is growing*, but concerns over security and safety standards remain crucial for broader integration, especially as robots work alongside humans.

**Scores:** {"scale": 7, "impact": 8, "novelty": 6, "longTermSignificance": 8}
**Keywords:** [Robotics, Automation, Workforce, Safety, North America]

items.title: PACK EXPO Las Vegas Highlighting Sustainability
items.summary: *PACK EXPO Las Vegas emphasizes its commitment to *sustainability* with initiatives like Recycling partnerships, Sustainability Central sessions, and Guided Tours.* The event features over 2,300 exhibitors, 100+ educational sessions, and showcases eco-friendly solutions like reusable packaging and green exhibitors.* It aims to foster *industry-wide sustainability* awareness, innovation, and connections for a greener future in packaging and processing.

items.title: ABI Research Names Siemens’ Teamcenter Leading PLM Software for Large Discrete Manufacturers
Hargrove Controls & Automation Forms New Partnership with ABB
Machinery Orders Rise as Automation Grows, Aerospace Soars
Motion Announces Joint Venture With Canadian Indigenous Development Firm
Rethinking Industrial Alarms for a Safer, Smarter Plant
items.summary:
*Alarm systems are evolving from simple notifications to intelligent safety tools in complex industries.*
- Modern alarms serve as functional safety elements, complying with standards like IEC 61508 and performing critical protection roles.
- Smart alarm systems enhance diagnostics, enable proactive maintenance, and support real-time decision-making for safer, more efficient operations.

items.title: Dispel & ABB Partner for Secure Remote Access
items.summary:
*Dispel and ABB announced a multi-year partnership to enhance *secure remote access* for industrial clients.*
- Leveraging Dispel’s *Zero Trust-based* OT remote access technology, the collaboration aims to improve *security, speed,* and *performance* of remote industrial services.
- This initiative supports ABB Care's goal of providing *secure, efficient* digital support, emphasizing *real-time data streaming*, *cybersecurity*, and *proactive maintenance* capabilities.

items.title: Wesco Launches entroCIM Platform for Pulp & Paper Industry
items.summary:
*Wesco International* unveiled its new *entroCIM Central Intelligence Manager* at a key industry conference, aiming to streamline *building operations* in pulp and paper facilities. 

- The platform consolidates IT and OT systems, providing real-time insights, predictive analytics, and support for connected devices via 50+ APIs.
- It helps optimize energy use, reduce costs, enhance safety, and boost overall productivity amidst industry challenges like supply chain disruptions and labor shortages.

**Keywords:** industrial IoT, pulp and paper, building automation, safety, digital transformation

items.title: Design Solutions for Robotics in New Ebook
items.summary: *Mouser Electronics*, in collaboration with *Molex*, released an interactive ebook called *The Electric Workforce* on how advanced connectivity and power management drive robotics.* The ebook covers challenges in designing household and industrial robots, focusing on reliable interconnect components like Molex's products.* It highlights innovations such as flexible cables, mid-voltage connectors, and space-efficient wire-to-wire connectors vital for robotic applications.

items.title: Siemens Named a Leader in 2025 PLM Evaluation
items.summary:
- Siemens was named a *Leader* in the 2025 PLM Analyst Evaluation by Forrester Research, excelling in 11 criteria.
- The report highlights Siemens’ strong Strategy and commitment to *innovative*, flexible PLM solutions within the Siemens Xcelerator portfolio.
- Customers praise Siemens for support, security, clear communication, and plan to continue purchasing from them, reinforcing Siemens’ leadership position.

items.title: Honeywell and Stereolabs Develop Innovative Mobile Solution to Simplify Logistics Across the Supply Chain
Endress+Hauser Fully Acquires CodeWrights
items.summary:
- *Endress+Hauser* has become the **sole owner** of *CodeWrights GmbH*, previously sharing ownership with Pepperl+Fuchs.
- The company, founded in 2002, specializes in **customized software solutions** for measurement and automation industries.
- This acquisition aims to *strengthen* Endress+Hauser’s *digital transformation* efforts without affecting current customer service or operations.

items.title: Intertrade Hellas Improves Tissue Quality with ABB System
items.summary:
*Intertrade Hellas* has contracted ABB to supply a *Quality Control System* (QCS) for their tissue machines, aiming to enhance product consistency and process efficiency. 
- The *NP1200-based* platform includes sensors, controls, and integration with existing systems, supporting *digital transformation* and sustainability efforts. 
- The system's precision and robustness are expected to reduce energy use, lower environmental impact, and optimize production quality long-term.

items.title: Women in Manufacturing 2025 Hall of Fame Inductees
items.summary:
*The Women in Manufacturing Association (WiM)* announced the *2025 Hall of Fame inductees* dedicated to women leaders in industry.
- The *12 inductees* include influential women from various manufacturing sectors, celebrated at the WiM SUMMIT in Chicago.
- These women have made *significant contributions* to supporting and inspiring women, paving the way for future generations in manufacturing.

"The impact of these trailblazing women highlights WiM's mission to promote *inclusion* and *industry excellence*."

items.title: Pleora Appoints Anis Hanna as President on 25th Anniversary
items.summary:
*Pleora Technologies* has appointed *Anis Hanna* as president during its 25th anniversary.
- Hanna's extensive background spans operations, supply chain, sales, IT, and engineering, and he has contributed significantly since joining in 2014.
- The company is launching new imaging solutions, including high-speed frame grabbers and advanced video interfaces, to reinforce its industry leadership in vision and imaging sectors.

items.title: DigiKey Wins Sensirion Distribution Award
items.summary:
- *DigiKey* received the **2025 Distribution Excellence High Service Level Award** from *Sensirion*.
- The award recognized DigiKey’s **global customer growth** and revenue performance, emphasizing its partnership strength.
- Sensirion, a leader in sensors for humidity, gas, and liquid flow, has partnered with DigiKey since 2016, highlighting their strategic collaboration and mutual growth.

items.title: Addverb Reinvents Its Factory Automation Development With Siemens Xcelerator
ABB secures UK steel project orders
items.summary:
*ABB will supply power management and electromagnetic stirring tech at Tata Steel's UK plant.*
- The project supports Tata Steel's goal to produce fossil-free steel and reduce CO₂ emissions by 90% by 2045.
- Technologies will be commissioned by 2027, boosting efficiency, productivity, and sustainability at Port Talbot Steelworks.

items.title: Lexington Manufacturing Acquires Tru-Cut, Inc.
items.summary:
- *Lexington Manufacturing* has acquired *Tru-Cut, Inc.*, a respected OEM component supplier in Indiana.
- The integration will expand Lexington's manufacturing footprint and enhance service capabilities nationwide.
- The move emphasizes *growth*, *alignment*, and maintaining *quality* and *customer service* during the transition, supporting long-term value.

items.title: The Benefits of Collaborative IT/OT Cybersecurity Strategies
items.author: Sid Snitkin
items.summary:
*Most industrial companies have separate IT and OT cybersecurity programs, leading to significant *maturity gaps* in OT security.*

- *Collaborative IT/OT cybersecurity leverages IT resources and expertise to bridge these gaps cost-effectively.*
- *This approach helps mitigate serious risks and enhances overall security without extensive plant downtime.*
- *OT cybersecurity tends to be less mature, with gaps in technology, personnel, and incident response compared to IT.*

items.title: Baked to Perfection: NORD at IBIE
items.summary:
- **NORD DRIVESYSTEMS** showcased its *innovative drive solutions* tailored for the bakery industry at the IBIE expo in Las Vegas.
- The company emphasized *products designed for* *hygienic, washdown environments*, such as *corrosion-resistant* gear motors and *compact, quiet gear units*.
- Their offerings include *high-efficiency synchronous motors*, *advanced electronic controls*, and *predictive maintenance solutions* to enhance system reliability and reduce costs.

Scores: {"scale": 8, "impact": 7, "novelty": 8, "longTermSignificance": 7}
keywords: [Drive Technology, Bakery Industry, Innovation, Automation, Predictive Maintenance]

items.title: Siemens Earns Platinum and Highest-Ever Score in EcoVadis Sustainability Rating
Can Europe’s Domestic Lithium-Ion Battery Manufacturers Gain a Firm Foothold in the 800 GWh Race?
items.summary:
*Europe announced a €852 million investment in six lithium-ion battery factories to boost capacity and reduce reliance on external supply chains.*
- By 2030, Europe's lithium-ion battery capacity is expected to surpass 800 GWh, with domestic firms increasing their share to 43%.
- Despite policy support, European firms face challenges like technological maturity, supply chain complexity, and project delays, impacting their competitive advantage.*

items.title: Otto Mation Comic Caption Contest: August 2025
What Tariffs Reveal: A Wake-Up Call to Strengthen Manufacturing Skills
KUKA Connexions 2025: Making Automation Easier Through Innovation and Partnership
Comau Completes Acquisition of Automha, Expanding Leadership in Advanced Logistics Automation
Tolomatic Announces Leadership Transition: Manish Virmani Appointed President and CEO
Mazak Ramps Up Service and Support Coverage in the West With New Phoenix Technical Center
A3’s Humanoid Robot Forum Returns Sept. 23 to Explore the Future of Manufacturing With Humanoid Technologies
Ransomware Surges as Attempts Spike 146% Amid Aggressive Extortion Tactics
Hapman Celebrates 80 Years of Excellence
Authorized Distributor Mouser Electronics Stocking the Latest Products and Solutions from Phoenix Contact
Operational Maturity: The Missing Link in Cybersecurity Success
items.summary:
- *Cybersecurity success* depends more on **operational maturity**, involving repeatable, business-aligned processes.
- Many organizations fail due to lack of **mature processes**, integration, and continuous monitoring, not just cyber threats.
- Building *operational maturity* requires assessing gaps, standardizing workflows, promoting collaboration, and ongoing training to enhance resilience and strategic alignment.

items.title: Smart Water for a Smart Asia: Digital Solutions
items.summary:
*Asia faces an unprecedented water crisis due to rising demand, climate change, and infrastructure challenges.*
- Digitalization, including IoT, AI, and smart management tools, offers **transformative solutions** to improve water security.
- Successful implementation depends on overcoming barriers like data silos, investment shortages, and skills gaps, with collaboration and innovative models being key.**

**Scores:** {
  "scale": 8,
  "impact": 9,
  "novelty": 7,
  "longTermSignificance": 9
}

**Keywords:** [Water Management, Digitalization, Asia, Climate Resilience, Infrastructure, Water Crisis]

items.title: IFS Launches Emissions Management with Climatiq
items.summary:
*IFS partners with Climatiq to integrate a new Emissions Management module into IFS Cloud.*
- This module uses Climatiq’s carbon data engine to automate and improve *carbon footprint tracking* for industries.
- The collaboration aims to embed *sustainability* into daily business operations, helping companies meet global emissions standards and make *data-driven, greener decisions.*

items.title: Divcon develops advanced controls for liquid-cooled data centers
items.summary:
- **Divcon Controls** played a key role in creating *smart control solutions* for Aligned Data Centers' new *Advanced Cooling Lab* in Phoenix.
- These solutions focus on *managing fluid dynamics, integrating diverse assets, and adapting to fluctuating IT loads*, optimizing *energy efficiency and sustainability*.
- The company's expertise supports *hybrid cooling* systems, enabling *future-proof, high-density AI and HPC data centers* with enhanced reliability and environmental responsibility.

items.title: ISA 2025 Automation Summit & Expo in Florida
items.summary:
*The ISA 2025 Automation Summit & Expo* will be held October 5-7 at Disney’s Coronado Springs Resort, featuring *tech discussions*, a *vendor expo*, and *keynote speakers* including NASA astronaut Douglas Hurley and cybersecurity expert Tom Liston.

Participants can explore *industry standards*, *cybersecurity*, and *AI impacts*, with activities like a *student VR showcase* and a *Awards Gala* at Disney’s Animal Kingdom.

Event offers *networking*, *certification courses*, and *exhibitor opportunities* amid leading companies like Honeywell, Rockwell Automation, and Mitsubishi Electric, emphasizing *professional growth* in automation fields.

items.title: 40 Years of Aucotec: From Software Pioneer to Digital Nervous System for Industry
items.summary:
*Aucotec AG celebrates 40 years of innovation since its founding in 1985.*

- The company has evolved from early products like Elcad to the comprehensive Engineering Base platform, central to modern industrial engineering.
- It has expanded globally, opening new offices and forming key partnerships in Industry 4.0 developments.
- Looking forward, Aucotec aims to integrate **AI** and **digital twins** to enhance its engineering solutions, emphasizing **sustainability** and **digital transformation**.

**Keywords:** industry automation, engineering software, digital twin, Industry 4.0, global expansion, AI
